8-3032.Controllable Electronic Record Fraud Prevention Act, how cited.

Sections 8-3032 to 8-3042 shall be known and may be cited as the Controllable Electronic Record Fraud Prevention Act.

SourceLaws 2025, LB609, ยง 1.Effective Date: September 3, 2025
